caption.p: Distribution of the number of hand-foot and mouth disease (HFMD) cases per week in each year between July 2012 and August 2019 in Japan. The horizontal and vertical axes represent the week of the year and the number of cases in Japan for each week, respectively. Months corresponding to the week number are colored by Japanese season as spring (pink), summer (orange), autumn (light brown) and winter (light blue). Colors and marks for each yearly series are presented in the legend at the bottom of the panel.
